channel.title: Ldap on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Ldap on TLDRBins

item.title: LDAP
item.description: Enum nmap ldapdomaindump ldapsearch # Using nmap script sudo nmap -p 389 --script ldap-search <TARGET> # Using ldapdomaindump (With Creds) ldapdomaindump -u '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -o ./ldap # Get domain base ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -s base namingcontexts # Get all from domain ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # Just get a class (e.g. person) ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' '(objectClass=person)' # With creds ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -D "CN=<USER>,CN=Users,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>" -w '<PASSWORD>' -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' Enum with Kerberos ldapsearch nxc # Add GSSAPI sudo apt install libsasl2-modules-gssapi-mit ldapsearch -H ldap://<TARGET> -Y GSSAPI -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # With kerberos nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -k --users

item.title: NetExec (nxc)
item.description: Basic Commands # Single user and password nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' # Single user and password (Active Directory) nxc smb -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> -dc-ip <DC_IP> # Multiple users or passwords nxc smb -u <USERNAMES> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> -dc-ip <DC_IP> --continue-on-success # Match username to corresponding password nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USERNAMES> -p <PASSWORDS> --no-bruteforce --continue-on-success # With LM Hash:NT Hash nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -H <LM>:<NT> # With Kerberos, or STATUS_ACCOUNT_RESTRICTION (NTLM disabled) nxc smb -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> -k <TARGET> Supported protocols +----------------------------------------------------------+ | ftp | ldap | mssql | rdp | smb | ssh | vnc | winrm | wmi | +----------------------------------------------------------+ RID Brute nxc smb <TARGET> -u guest -p '' --rid-brute 10000 User Enum (Authenticated) nxc smb <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -d <DOMAIN> --users Ref: Download nxc

item.title: RPC
item.description: Remote Procedure Call Tools rpcclient impacket # Connect without creds rpcclient -U '' -N <TARGET> # Connect with creds rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> # Inline execute command rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -c 'querydispinfo' Basic Commands # General info querydispinfo # List of users enumdomusers # List of groups enumdomgroups # Query group by rid querygroup <RID> # Query group member by rid querygroupmem <RID> # Query user by rid queryuser <RID> # Look up a user lookupnames <USER> # Look up by SID lookupsids <SID> impacket-lookupsid '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>'
